policyAssignmentId.Description: The resource ID of the policy assignment that should be remediated.

policyDefinitionReferenceId.Description: The policy definition reference ID of the individual definition that should be remediated. Required when the policy assignment being remediated assigns a policy set definition.

createdOn.Description: The time at which the remediation was created.

lastUpdatedOn.Description: The time at which the remediation was last updated.

filters.Description: The filters that will be applied to determine which resources to remediate.

deploymentStatus.Description: The deployment status summary for all deployments created by the remediation.

locations.Description: The resource locations that will be remediated.

totalDeployments.Description: The number of deployments required by the remediation.

successfulDeployments.Description: The number of deployments required by the remediation that have succeeded.

failedDeployments.Description: The number of deployments required by the remediation that have failed.

nextLink.Description: The URL to get the next set of results.

trackedResourceId.Description: The ID of the policy tracked resource.

policyDetails.Description: The details of the policy that require the tracked resource.

createdBy.Description: The details of the policy triggered deployment that created the tracked resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The details of the policy triggered deployment that modified the tracked resource.

lastUpdateUtc.Description: Timestamp of the last update to the tracked resource.

policyDefinitionId.Description: The ID of the policy definition.

policyAssignmentId.Description: The ID of the policy assignment.

policyAssignmentDisplayName.Description: The display name of the policy assignment.

policyAssignmentScope.Description: The scope of the policy assignment.

policySetDefinitionId.Description: The ID of the policy set definition.

policyDefinitionReferenceId.Description: The policy definition reference ID within the policy set definition.

policyDetails.Description: The details of the policy that created or modified the tracked resource.

deploymentId.Description: The ID of the deployment that created or modified the tracked resource.

deploymentTime.Description: Timestamp of the deployment that created or modified the tracked resource.

value.Description: Array of deployments for the remediation.

nextLink.Description: The URL to get the next set of results.

remediatedResourceId.Description: Resource ID of the resource that is being remediated by the deployment.

deploymentId.Description: Resource ID of the template deployment that will remediate the resource.

resourceLocation.Description: Location of the resource that is being remediated.

error.Description: Error encountered while remediated the resource.

createdOn.Description: The time at which the remediation was created.

lastUpdatedOn.Description: The time at which the remediation deployment was last updated.

code.Description: Service specific error code which serves as the substatus for the HTTP error code.

type.Description: The type of included error details.

@odata.context.Description: OData context string; used by OData clients to resolve type information based on metadata.

@odata.count.Description: OData entity count; represents the number of policy event records returned.

@odata.nextLink.Description: Odata next link; URL to get the next set of results.

@odata.id.Description: OData entity ID; always set to null since policy event records do not have an entity ID.

@odata.context.Description: OData context string; used by OData clients to resolve type information based on metadata.

timestamp.Description: Timestamp for the policy event record.

effectiveParameters.Description: Effective parameters for the policy assignment.

isCompliant.Description: Flag which states whether the resource is compliant against the policy assignment it was evaluated against.

policySetDefinitionId.Description: Policy set definition ID, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

policySetDefinitionName.Description: Policy set definition name, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

policySetDefinitionOwner.Description: Policy set definition owner, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

policySetDefinitionCategory.Description: Policy set definition category, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

policySetDefinitionParameters.Description: Policy set definition parameters, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

managementGroupIds.Description: Comma separated list of management group IDs, which represent the hierarchy of the management groups the resource is under.

policyDefinitionReferenceId.Description: Reference ID for the policy definition inside the policy set, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

tenantId.Description: Tenant ID for the policy event record.

principalOid.Description: Principal object ID for the user who initiated the resource operation that triggered the policy event.

@odata.context.Description: OData context string; used by OData clients to resolve type information based on metadata.

@odata.count.Description: OData entity count; represents the number of policy state records returned.

@odata.nextLink.Description: Odata next link; URL to get the next set of results.

@odata.id.Description: OData entity ID; always set to null since policy state records do not have an entity ID.

@odata.context.Description: OData context string; used by OData clients to resolve type information based on metadata.

timestamp.Description: Timestamp for the policy state record.

effectiveParameters.Description: Effective parameters for the policy assignment.

isCompliant.Description: Flag which states whether the resource is compliant against the policy assignment it was evaluated against.

policySetDefinitionId.Description: Policy set definition ID, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

policySetDefinitionName.Description: Policy set definition name, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

policySetDefinitionOwner.Description: Policy set definition owner, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

policySetDefinitionCategory.Description: Policy set definition category, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

policySetDefinitionParameters.Description: Policy set definition parameters, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

managementGroupIds.Description: Comma separated list of management group IDs, which represent the hierarchy of the management groups the resource is under.

policyDefinitionReferenceId.Description: Reference ID for the policy definition inside the policy set, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

path.Description: Property path if the expression is a field or an alias.

targetValue.Description: Target value to be compared with the expression value.

operator.Description: Operator to compare the expression value and the target value.

resourceId.Description: ID of the last evaluated resource for IfNotExists effect.

totalResources.Description: Total number of resources to which the existence condition is applicable.

@odata.context.Description: OData context string; used by OData clients to resolve type information based on metadata.

@odata.count.Description: OData entity count; represents the number of summaries returned; always set to 1.

@odata.id.Description: OData entity ID; always set to null since summaries do not have an entity ID.

@odata.context.Description: OData context string; used by OData clients to resolve type information based on metadata.

results.Description: Non-compliance summary for all policy assignments.

queryResultsUri.Description: HTTP POST URI for queryResults action on Microsoft.PolicyInsights to retrieve raw results for the non-compliance summary.

policySetDefinitionId.Description: Policy set definition ID, if the policy assignment is for a policy set.

results.Description: Non-compliance summary for the policy assignment.

effect.Description: Policy effect, i.e. policy definition action.

results.Description: Non-compliance summary for the policy definition.
